meanings.definition: Not under a spell or magic.
meanings.sent1: The plain, unenchanted rock sat quietly in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The old, unenchanted house had a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent3: The unenchanted broom refused to sweep the floor on its own.
meanings.sent4: Her unenchanted heart longed for a touch of magic.
meanings.sent5: The unenchanted forest seemed to hold a secret within its depths.

meanings.sent1: The unenchanted expression on his face revealed his disappointment.
meanings.sent2: She gazed at the unenchanted painting with indifference.
meanings.sent3: The unenchanted puppy wagged its tail half-heartedly.
meanings.sent4: His unenchanted reaction to the surprise party puzzled everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unenchanted audience barely clapped at the end of the show.

meanings.sent1: The unenchanted sword was just a simple piece of metal.
meanings.sent2: The unenchanted potion had no effect on the illness.
meanings.sent3: The unenchanted ring did not grant any wishes.
meanings.sent4: Her unenchanted voice lacked the power to mesmerize.
meanings.sent5: The unenchanted cloak failed to make its wearer invisible.
